channel.title: How To make a Dragon Full Helm the way Black PK did
channel.description:
this was made because black pk wanted rep to know something that frugoo made, i am going to post how to make the fake dragon full helm.
First Open Item.Java and search for: [code] 1057 [/code] Remove it and the one of the "," by it.
Then search [code] public static int capes[/code] then go over to the last Item Id And Put right before the }; put [code] ,1057 [/code] then save and compile. Then after that get a dragon helm and a haloween mask and weir them both

item.title: How To make a Dragon Full Helm the way Black PK did

dude thx for the tut now i got d pl8 and full helm just when u use full helm dont use d mes use bronze full helm kos it looks better

YOU ROCK@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

Read full topic
